snippet: The Broncos and the pass rusher DeMarcus Ware agreed on a three-year deal, and the Browns released quarterbacks Brandon Weeden and Jason Campbell.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos sign defensive end DeMarcus Ware for $30 million; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Broncos and the pass rusher DeMarcus Ware agreed on a three-year deal, and the Browns released quarterbacks Brandon Weeden and Jason Campbell.

headline.main: Ware Lands in Denver; Weeden Released by Cleveland
headline.print_headline: Ware Lands in Denver; Weeden Is Released by Cleveland
